title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: The ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? method is not producing the expected output. The output is "MySomeAnn", but I expect it to be "MySomeClass". This issue is specific to the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: When I run the code using Tomcat 7.0.0, the output of the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method is "MySomeAnn".
